sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>(Incidental, out of turn) The character may spend one Destiny Point to perform a Move maneuver as an incidental. This maneuver may only be used to move into cover or out of the blast radius of an explosion. This may be performed out of turn. This incidental occurs after the character determines he would be hit by the blast, but before damage is applied. (The GM may allow the character to use this talent in other situations to get out of harm's way, but only at his discretion.)</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Time to Go</name> <number>TAL0001262</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-05 22:55:39</sys_created_on> <sys_id>2ecfa7e52f18a850e0f497eef699b61a</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-05 22:55:39</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
